title: Summer Beats Festival
description: The Summer Beats Festival is the highlight of this year's cultural calendar, bringing together music enthusiasts from all corners for a weekend of sonic celebration. Set against the scenic backdrop of Central Park, New City, this festival promises an eclectic lineup of world-renowned musicians, bands, and DJs across multiple stages. Beyond the music, attendees will be treated to a gastronomic journey with gourmet food stalls, craft beer gardens, and cocktail bars featuring local and international delicacies. Interactive art installations, workshop zones, and chill-out spaces ensure a rich, multi-sensory experience. Whether you're a die-hard music fan or a family looking for a memorable summer outing, the Summer Beats Festival offers something for everyone.

booth.name: Merch Booth
booth.description: Official festival merchandise, including t-shirts, hats, and posters.

booth.name: Food Truck Fiesta
booth.description: A collection of the city's best food trucks offering a variety of cuisines.

booth.name: VIP Lounge
booth.description: Exclusive lounge area with complimentary drinks, private restrooms, and premium stage views.

booth.name: Interactive Art Installations
booth.description: Experience and contribute to live art installations created by local artists.

booth.name: Eco Zone
booth.description: Learn about sustainability and participate in eco-friendly activities and initiatives.

booth.name: Kids' Play Area
booth.description: A safe and fun play area for children, featuring interactive games, face painting, and educational workshops.

title: Gourmet Bites Festival
description: The Gourmet Bites Festival is a culinary extravaganza showcasing the finest in local and international cuisine. Set in the picturesque Downtown Riverfront Park, this event is a food lover's paradise, offering a chance to explore gourmet dishes, street food favorites, and innovative culinary creations from around the globe. Attendees can look forward to live cooking demonstrations, meet-and-greets with renowned chefs, and a variety of interactive food and beverage workshops. The festival also features live music, a craft beer garden, and a wine tasting pavilion, making it the perfect destination for a gastronomic adventure with family and friends.

booth.name: The Burger Joint
booth.description: Gourmet burgers with a twist, featuring locally sourced ingredients.

booth.name: Sushi Spectacular
booth.description: Fresh, artisanal sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi prepared by top sushi chefs.

booth.name: Vegan Delights
booth.description: A variety of delicious and inventive vegan dishes that will delight even the most discerning palates.

booth.name: Italian Street Eats
booth.description: Authentic Italian pizzas and pastas, made using traditional recipes and ingredients.

booth.name: BBQ & Smokery
booth.description: Slow-cooked, smoked meats and BBQ favorites with homemade sauces and rubs.

booth.name: Dessert Oasis
booth.description: A sweet paradise featuring cakes, pastries, ice creams, and gourmet desserts.

booth.name: Craft Beer Hub
booth.description: Sample a wide range of craft beers from the best local and national breweries.

booth.name: Global Street Food
booth.description: Take a culinary tour with street food delicacies from Asia, Latin America, and beyond.

booth.name: Coffee Connoisseurs
booth.description: Explore the world of coffee with tastings, workshops, and barista demonstrations.

booth.name: Cheese & Wine Paradise
booth.description: A selection of fine cheeses paired with exquisite wines from around the world.

title: Acoustic Evenings
description: Acoustic Evenings brings an intimate concert experience to the heart of the city, featuring a lineup of talented singer-songwriters and acoustic bands. Set under the stars at the cozy Greenfield Park, this event promises a night of heartfelt melodies, soul-stirring lyrics, and warm, inviting vibes. Beyond the music, the festival offers an array of booths catering to every interest - from vintage vinyl and artisan crafts to gourmet snacks and interactive art installations. Perfect for music lovers of all ages, Acoustic Evenings is an ode to the power of music and community.

booth.name: Vinyl Vintage
booth.description: Rare and vintage vinyl records for collectors and enthusiasts.
